thread.title: Watch: NCT Dream Wins For 3rd Week In A Row On “The Show,” SF9 Performs BTS Cover, And More
thread.title_full: Watch: NCT Dream Wins For 3rd Week In A Row On “The Show,” SF9 Performs BTS Cover, And More

author: ilmare42
title: Watch: NCT Dream Wins For 3rd Week In A Row On “The Show,” SF9 Performs BTS Cover, And More
text:
Pin   
NCT Dream has won for the third week in a row on “ The Show ” with their track “My First and Last”! 
On February 28’s episode of “The Show,” NCT Dream went up against Melody Day and 100% for the top spot. They came in first by receiving a total score of 9,162, while Melody Day grabbed a score of 6,782 and 100% came in third with a score of 6,446. 
As they accepted their trophy, Mark thanked their managers and everyone around them who has helped them get where they are, as well as expressed his thanks to his fellow members. 
Watch their performance of “My First and Last” and their win below! 
Other performers in this week’s episode included SF9, DreamCatcher, 100%, Melody Day, BIGFLO, B.I.G, MASC, BP Rania, M.FECT, WALWARI, and more. 
There were also two special performances this week, with SF9 performing BTS’s “Boy in Luv” and DreamCatcher performing Girls’ Generation’s “Into the New World”! Check them out below. 
SF9 –“Boy in Luv” (Cover of BTS) 
SF9 –“Roar” 
DreamCatcher –“Into the New World” (Cover of Girls’ Generation) 
DreamCatcher –“Chase Me” 
Melody Day –“Kiss on the Lips” 
BP Rania –“Make Me Ah” 
M.FECT –“Reason”
